characters: The scene shows a street with cars, pedestrians, and buildings. There are several pedestrians on the right side of the road, some waiting to cross. A man on a bicycle is crossing the road from left to right. There are cars parked on both sides of the street. The weather appears to be sunny.
summary: The vehicle is driving straight on a city street with moderate traffic. There are pedestrians on the sidewalks and some crossing the street. The vehicle maintains a consistent speed and direction. A man on a bicycle crosses the road in front of the vehicle.
actions: The vehicle is driving straight at a consistent speed. The driver is maintaining the current lane and adjusting speed to match the flow of traffic. The vehicle is approaching an intersection with pedestrians crossing.
key_objects: 1) Right side: Pedestrians waiting to cross the street, medium distance, potential to enter the roadway. 2) Left side: Man on a bicycle crossing the road, medium distance, potential to enter the roadway.
